stories.headline: TV transformed
stories.summary: Examines the slow adoption of computer-assisted reporting (CAR) by local TV stations despite its potential to enhance investigative journalism.

stories.headline: Access granted
stories.summary: Investigated the use of a database to track political campaign contributions, revealing hidden contributions and influencing access to government officials.

stories.headline: Pension plunder
stories.summary: Analyzed a massive database to uncover weaknesses in the pension system, revealing cases of embezzlement affecting workers' retirement savings.

stories.headline: Problem paramedics
stories.summary: A computer-assisted investigation exposed paramedics with criminal backgrounds, revealing flaws in the certification system.

stories.headline: Speed Demons
stories.summary: Investigated driving offenses using police department databases, finding gaps in speeding ticket reporting and prosecution lapses.
